text: The women's pole vault event at the 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Annecy, France, at Parc des Sports on 28 and 29 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Monika Götz ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| María Mar Sánchez ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Monika Pyrek ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 29 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
